vision_analysis.read_text: MENU APPETIZERS PRIX FIXE Shrimp Remoulade/Shrimp Cocktail . . . 16.00 Three Courses: 45 Spicy Lobster . .19.00 First Course: Lobster Bisque Baked Escargot . 16.00 Entrée: Cornish Game Hen, Seared Ahi Tuna . 17.00 Grilled Salmon or 12 oz Sirloin Prosciutto Wrapped Mozzarella . 14.00 Dessert: Bananas Foster STEAK CUTS SALADS AND SOUPS Filet Mignon, 8 ounce .38.00 Spinach Salad . 9.50 Apples, goat cheese, apple cider dressing Filet Mignon, 12 ounce . 49.00 Caprese Salad . . 7.50 Rib Eye Steak, 18 ounce . 39.00 Ripe tomato with fresh mozzarella and basil Porterhouse for Two . 40.00 French Onion Soup . .. . . . . . 5.00

recommendations.reason: Vegetarian-friendly with fresh mozzarella, ripe tomatoes, and basil. Provides protein from cheese and vitamins from tomatoes.
recommendations.healthier_modifications: Request less mozzarella to reduce saturated fat, or ask for balsamic glaze instead of oil if available.

recommendations.reason: Vegetarian and nutrient-dense with spinach, apples, and goat cheese. Offers fiber, vitamins, and moderate protein.
recommendations.healthier_modifications: Request apple cider dressing on the side to control portion, and consider reducing goat cheese amount for lower calories.
